description: In an alternate version of Penguin Village, Akane, Arale, & Gatchan make up the "Hoyoyo Gang", a group of criminals who announce a challenge to the police to try and stop them from stealing a valuable item. However, the things they steal end up being a bit odd and not as valuable as one would expect. Can Officer Taro and Inspector Peasuke stop these viscous criminals?

titles.title: アラレの怪盗ほよよ団
